name: d3-timer
description: An efficient queue capable of managing thousands of concurrent animations.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-timer.js -c -m -o build/d3-timer.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-timer/build/d3-timer.js d3-timer.v1.js && cp ../d3-timer/build/d3-timer.min.js d3-timer.v1.min.js && git add d3-timer.v1.js d3-timer.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-timer ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-timer.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-timer.js build/d3-timer.min.js
